member.summary: Set a proxy for the websocket itself.

member.name: F:StoatSharp.ClientConfig.ApiUrl
member.summary: Do not change this unless you know what you're doing.
member.remarks: Defaults to https://stoat.chat/api/

member.name: F:StoatSharp.ClientConfig.Debug
member.summary: Do not use this unless you know what you're doing.

member.name: F:StoatSharp.ClientConfig.CfClearance
member.summary: The cf_clearance cookie for Cloudflare.
member.remarks: This is only neccesary if Stoat is currently in Under Attack Mode (eg during a DDoS attack). Please ensure that the user agent and IP used to generate the clearance cookie will be identical to the ones used by your StoatSharp client, or else CloudFlare will not accept the clearance.
